name: Pong-ino
description:
PONG-INO

A tiny Pong implementation for the lovely PICO-8 Fantasy Console, written in LUA

If you are one of the lucky PICO-8 owners you can download it here.

If you'd play it even for 60 seconds and you'd have time to leave a comment, a suggestion, anything to help me improving a bit... 

I'd be very happy :)

SPECIAL THANKS FOR THE AWESOME MUSIC

Intro Music and Game Over Music are thanks to Gruber's talent:
https://twitter.com/gruber_music
